scripts.bootstrap: npm run install-child-deps && npm run start-prod
scripts.install-child-deps: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd client && npm run watch-css" "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run build && npm run start-dev"
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build && npm run start"
